00042 IAEA_PhspSource::IAEA_PhspSource(const string &phsp_file,
00043         const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(Name,f) {
00044     init(); openFile(phsp_file);
00045 }
00046 
00047 void IAEA_PhspSource::init() {
00048     otype = "IAEA_PhspSource";
00049     Xmin = -1e30; Xmax = 1e30; Ymin = -1e30; Ymax = 1e30;
00050     is_valid = false; mode2 = false; swap_bytes = false;
00051     the_file_name = "no file"; filter_type = -1; particle_type = 2;
00052     description = "Invalid IAEA phase space source";
00053     Nread = 0; count = 0; Nrecycle = 0;
00054     Npos = 0; Nlast = 0;
00055     wmin = -1e30; wmax = 1e30;
00056     Nreuse_g = 1; Nreuse_e = 1; Nreuse = 1; Nuse = 2; first = true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void IAEA_PhspSource::openFile(const string &phsp_file) {
00060     the_file_name = "no file"; is_valid = false;
00061     int rwmode=1; //read only
00062     iaea_fileid=0; //this is just an array index for the iaea routines, not an actual
00063                    //unit no., as in Fortran, so it can really be any integer value
00064                    //not above MAX_NUM_SOURCES (30)
00065 
00066     //below is required because iaea opening routine gets file name as char array
00067     int len = phsp_file.length();
00068     char phsp_name_tmp[len+1];
00069     phsp_file.copy(phsp_name_tmp,len,0);
00070     //now put a null character on the end
00071      phsp_name_tmp[len]='\0';
00072 
00073     //use iaea function for opening phase space file
00074     iaea_new_source(&iaea_fileid,phsp_name_tmp,&rwmode,&iaea_iostat,len);
00075     if (iaea_iostat==105) {
00076         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: no header file name supplied.\n");
00077                 return;
00078     }
00079     else if( iaea_iostat==-96 ) {
00080         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to open header file %s.IAEAheader\n"
00081                    " for reading\n",phsp_file.c_str()); return;
00082     }
00083     else if( iaea_iostat==-94 ) {
00084         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to open phase space file %s.IAEAphsp\n"
00085                    " for reading\n",phsp_file.c_str()); return;
00086     }
00087     else if( iaea_iostat==-1 ) {
00088         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to initialize phase space source %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00089         return;
00090     }
00091     else if( iaea_iostat==-91 ) {
00092         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get record contents from header file %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00093         return;
00094     }
00095     else if( iaea_iostat <0 ) {
00096         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: I/O error ocurred on opening phase space file %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00097         return;
00098     }
00099 
00100     //now check file size and byte order
00101 
00102     swap_bytes = false;
00103     iaea_check_file_size_byte_order(&iaea_fileid,&iaea_iostat);
00104     if (iaea_iostat==-1) {
00105        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: error reading file size/byte order from header %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00106        return;
00107     }
00108     else if (iaea_iostat==-4) {
00109        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: byte mismatch between phase space file and machine.  Will swap bytes.\n");
00110        swap_bytes = true;
00111     }
00112     else if (iaea_iostat==-3 || iaea_iostat==-5) {
00113        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: mismatch between file size in header and actual file size of %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00114        return;
00115     }
00116 
00117     //now get some info from the header
00118     EGS_I64 n, n_photon, pinc; float emax, zposn;
00119     int iaea_type=-1; //for getting no. of particles
00120     iaea_get_max_particles(&iaea_fileid,&iaea_type,&n);
00121     if (n<0) {
00122        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get total no. of particles from %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00123        return;
00124     }
00125     iaea_type=1; //for getting no. of photons
00126     iaea_get_max_particles(&iaea_fileid,&iaea_type,&n_photon);
00127     if (n_photon<0) {
00128        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get no. of photons from %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00129        return;
00130     }
00131     //now get max. energy
00132     iaea_get_maximum_energy(&iaea_fileid,&emax);
00133     if (emax<0) {
00134        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get max. energy from %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00135        return;
00136     }
00137     //no. of particles incident from original source
00138     iaea_get_total_original_particles(&iaea_fileid,&pinc);
00139     if (pinc<0) {
00140        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get no. of original particles from %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00141        return;
00142     }
00143 
00144     //get number of extra float and extra long variables so we can set array dimensions
00145     iaea_get_extra_numbers(&iaea_fileid,&n_extra_floats,&n_extra_longs);
00146     if (n_extra_floats==-1 || n_extra_longs==-1) {
00147        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get no. of extra floats and longs stored in %s.IAEAphsp\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00148        return;
00149     }
00150     //determine if Zlast is stored in the file and, if so, its array index, i_zlast
00151     int extrafloat_types[n_extra_floats], extralong_types[n_extra_longs];
00152     iaea_get_type_extra_variables(&iaea_fileid,&iaea_iostat,extralong_types,extrafloat_types);
00153     if (iaea_iostat==-1) {
00154        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: failed to get Mode of data %s.IAEAheader\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00155        return;
00156     }
00157     mode2=false;
00158     for (int i=0; i< n_extra_floats; i++) { if (extrafloat_types[i]==3) { mode2=true; i_zlast=i; break; } }
00159 
00160     //determine array index of latch
00161     latch_stored=false;
00162     for (int i=0; i< n_extra_longs; i++) { if (extralong_types[i]==2) { latch_stored=true; i_latch=i; break; } }
00163     if (!latch_stored) {
00164        egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::openFile: LATCH is not stored in data in %s.IAEAphsp\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00165     }
00166 
00167     Npos = 0; Nlast = n; Nfirst = 1;
00168     // at this point the position should be at the first particle in the file
00169     Emax = emax; Pinc = pinc; Nparticle = n; Nphoton = n_photon;
00170     is_valid = true; the_file_name = phsp_file;
00171 }
00172 
00173 IAEA_PhspSource::IAEA_PhspSource(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00174     EGS_BaseSource(input,f) {
00175     init();
00176     string fname; int err = input->getInput("iaea phase space file",fname);
00177     if( err ) {
00178         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource: no 'iaea phase space file' input\n");
00179         return;
00180     }
00181     openFile(fname);
00182     if( !isValid() ) {
00183         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource: errors while opening the phase space file"
00184               " %s\n",fname.c_str()); return;
00185     }
00186     vector<EGS_Float> cutout;
00187     err = input->getInput("cutout",cutout);
00188     if( !err && cutout.size() == 4 )
00189         setCutout(cutout[0],cutout[1],cutout[2],cutout[3]);
00190     vector<string> ptype;
00191     ptype.push_back("electrons"); ptype.push_back("photons");
00192     ptype.push_back("positrons"); ptype.push_back("all");
00193     ptype.push_back("charged");
00194     particle_type = input->getInput("particle type",ptype,3)-1;
00195     vector<int> the_filter; vector<string> the_latch;
00196     err = input->getInput("filter type",the_filter);
00197     int err1 = input->getInput("latch setting",the_latch);
00198     if( !err && !err1 ) {
00199         if( the_filter[0] >= 0 && the_filter[0] <= 3 ) {
00200             int nbit1 = the_latch[0].size(); int nbit2 = 0;
00201             if( !the_filter[0] ) nbit2 = the_latch[1].size();
00202             if( nbit1 + nbit2 > 0 ) {
00203                 int *the_bits = new int [nbit1+nbit2];
00204                 for(int j=0; j<nbit1+nbit2; j++) {
00205                     if( j < nbit1 ) the_bits[j]=(int) (the_latch[0][j] == '1');
00206                     else the_bits[j] = (int) (the_latch[1][j-nbit1] == '1');
00207                 }
00208                 setFilter(the_filter[0],nbit1,nbit2,the_bits);
00209                 delete [] the_bits;
00210             }
00211         }
00212     }
00213     vector<EGS_Float> wwindow;
00214     err = input->getInput("weight window",wwindow);
00215     if( !err && wwindow.size() == 2 ) {
00216         wmin = wwindow[0]; wmax = wwindow[1];
00217     }
00218     int ntmp; err = input->getInput("reuse photons",ntmp);
00219     if( !err && ntmp > 0 ) Nreuse_g = ntmp;
00220     err = input->getInput("reuse electrons",ntmp);
00221     if( !err && ntmp > 0 ) Nreuse_e = ntmp;
00222     description = "IAEA phase space source from "; description += the_file_name;
00223 }
00224 
00225 EGS_I64 IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *, int &q,
00226     int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt, EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00227     /*
00228     if( Nuse >= Nreuse ) {
00229         do { readParticle(); } while ( rejectParticle() );
00230     }
00231     */
00232     int nstat,extrainttemp[n_extra_longs];
00233     float extrafloattemp[n_extra_floats];
00234     if( Nuse >= Nreuse ) { //get a new particle
00235       if( (++Npos) > Nlast ) {
00236         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle(): reached the end of the "
00237                "phase space file chunk (%lld)\n  will start from the beginning "
00238                "of the chunk (%lld) but this "
00239                "implies that uncertainty estimates will be inaccurate\n",
00240                Nlast,Nfirst);
00241         iaea_set_record(&iaea_fileid,&Nfirst,&iaea_iostat);
00242         if(iaea_iostat<0) {
00243           egsFatal("IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle(): error restarting phase space chunk\n");
00244         }
00245         Nrecycle++; Npos = Nfirst;
00246       }
00247       iaea_get_particle(&iaea_fileid,&nstat,&p.q,&p.E,&p.wt,&p.x,&p.y,&p.z,&p.u,&p.v,&p.w,extrafloattemp,extrainttemp);
00248       ++Nread;
00249       if(latch_stored) p.latch = extrainttemp[i_latch];
00250       if(mode2) p.zlast = extrafloattemp[i_zlast];
00251       if(swap_bytes) {
00252             egsSwapBytes(&p.q); egsSwapBytes(&nstat); egsSwapBytes(&p.zlast);
00253             egsSwapBytes(&p.latch); egsSwapBytes(&p.E); egsSwapBytes(&p.wt);
00254             egsSwapBytes(&p.x); egsSwapBytes(&p.y); egsSwapBytes(&p.z);
00255             egsSwapBytes(&p.u); egsSwapBytes(&p.v); egsSwapBytes(&p.w);
00256       }
00257       //do check here because we need the swapped version of nstat
00258       if(nstat<0){
00259         egsFatal("IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle(): error reading particle number %i\n",Npos);
00260       }
00261       //convert charge from iaea type
00262       if(p.q==1) p.q=0;
00263       else if(p.q==2) p.q=-1;
00264       else if(p.q==3) p.q=1;
00265       else {
00266         egsFatal("IAEA_PhspSource::getNextParticle: unknown charge on particle\n");
00267       }
00268       if(!latch_stored) p.latch = 0; //need some non-nonsense value in case there is a LATCH filter
00269       //note: we don't have to convert to p.E to K.E. because that's what IAEA format stores
00270       if(first || nstat>0) count++; //increment primary history counter
00271       first= false;
00272       //store Nreuse
00273       if(p.q) Nreuse = Nreuse_e;
00274       else Nreuse = Nreuse_g;
00275       //reset Nuse
00276       Nuse = 0;
00277       p.wt /= Nreuse;
00278     }
00279 
00280     //energy, wt, position and direction cosines
00281     x.x = p.x; x.y = p.y; x.z = p.z;
00282     u.x = p.u; u.y = p.v, u.z = p.w;
00283     wt=p.wt;
00284     if( rejectParticle() ) wt = 0;
00285     E=p.E; q=p.q;
00286     //latch = 0;
00287     latch= p.latch;
00288     //rejectParticle uses BeamParticle, p
00289     ++Nuse;
00290     return count;
00291 }

00305 void IAEA_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(EGS_I64 nstart, EGS_I64 nrun) {
00306     if( nstart < 0 || nrun < 1 || nstart + nrun > Nparticle ) {
00307         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(): illegal attempt "
00308             "to set the simulation chunk between %lld and %lld ignored\n",
00309             nstart+1,nstart+nrun); return;
00310     }
00311     Nfirst = nstart+1; Nlast = nstart + nrun; Npos = nstart;
00312     iaea_set_record(&iaea_fileid,&Nfirst,&iaea_iostat);
00313     if(iaea_iostat<0) {
00314           egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(): error setting phase space chunk\n");
00315           return;
00316     }
00317     egsInformation("IAEA_PhspSource: using phsp portion between %lld and %lld\n",
00318             Nfirst,Nlast);
00319 }
00320 
00321 bool IAEA_PhspSource::rejectParticle() const {
00322     if( particle_type < 2 && p.q != particle_type ) return true;
00323     if( particle_type == 3 && !p.q ) return true;
00324     if( p.x < Xmin || p.x > Xmax || p.y < Ymin || p.y > Ymax ) return true;
00325     if( p.wt < wmin || p.wt > wmax ) return true;
00326     if( p.latch & 2147483648UL ) return true;
00327     if( filter_type < 0 ) return false;
00328     if( filter_type == 1 ) {
00329         bool r1; if( filter1 ) r1 = !(p.latch & filter1); else r1 = false;
00330         bool r2 = (p.latch & filter2);
00331         return (r1 || r2);
00332     }
00333     if( filter_type == 1 ) return (p.latch & filter1);
00334     int l = p.latch >> 24; bool res = l & filter1;
00335     return filter_type == 3 ? res : !res;
00336 }
00337 
00338 void IAEA_PhspSource::setFilter(int type, int nbit1, int nbit2, const int *bits){
00339     if( type < 0 || type > 3 ) {
00340         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::setFilter: invalid filter type %d\n",type);
00341         return;
00342     }
00343     int ntot = nbit1; if( type == 0 ) ntot += nbit2;
00344     if( ntot > 29 ) {
00345         egsWarning("IAEA_PhspSource::setFilter: maximum number of bits is "
00346              "limited to 29, you requested %d\n",ntot);
00347         return;
00348     }
00349     if( !ntot ) return;
00350     filter_type = type;
00351     if ( filter_type == 0 ) {
00352         int i; filter1 = 0; filter2 = 0;
00353         for(i=0; i<ntot; i++) {
00354             if( bits[i] ) {
00355                 unsigned int aux = 1; aux = (aux << i);
00356                 if( i < nbit1 ) filter1 += aux; else filter2 += aux;
00357             }
00358         }
00359     }
00360     else if( filter_type == 1 ) { // TODO
00361     }
00362     else if( filter_type == 2 ) { // TODO
00363     }
00364     else if( filter_type == 3 ) { // TODO
00365     }
00366 }

00371         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) { return
00372     createSourceTemplate<IAEA_PhspSource>(input,f,"iaea phsp source");
